backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing tasks, study subjects, user profiles, and daily goals with access control checks and user-specific CRUD/query operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old/new actor schemas and a simple run function that forwards study subjects while removing deprecated fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and configuration.
frontend/docs/task-completed-flash-integ: Documentation explaining how the task-completed flash animation integrates into TaskList’s completion flow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme CSS variables for light/dark modes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/quo: Array of Hindi inspirational quotes used by the task-completed flash animation.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/sni: Minimal demo showing how to include and trigger the task-completed flash animation in a simple page.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/sta: Standalone styled demo page showcasing the flash animation with a trigger button and auto-hide behavior.
frontend/public/task-completed-flash/tas: Defines styles and animations for a task completion popup with glow, pulse, and responsive layout adjustments.
Implements a vanilla JS component that displays a task completion popup with a random quote and auto‑hide behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React app with React Query, the router, and a global toaster component.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog for entering and saving the user's name with form validation and error states.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wraps child components and shows authentication or loading screens when the user is not signed in.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyR: Renders a dialog showing daily task statistics and lists, with print support for generating reports.
frontend/src/components/focus/FocusModeT: Provides a focus timer with start, pause, reset controls and formatted time display.
frontend/src/components/landing/FeatureG: Displays a grid of feature cards that navigate to different app sections when clicked.
frontend/src/components/landing/PrimaryB: Creates a styled primary button component with configurable size and classes.
Wraps content in a layout section with container styling and optional ID.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header component with navigation links, branding, and a login button, highlighting active routes.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper that renders the AppHeader and an outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Prompts users to enable browser notifications and handles permission states and errors.
frontend/src/components/tasks/AddTaskFor: Form for creating new tasks with validation, loading states, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskComple: Displays a temporary animated overlay with a random Hindi quote when a task is completed.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Renders active and completed tasks with controls for completion, deletion, and reminders, plus completion animation.
frontend/src/constants/taskCompletedHind: Exports an array of inspirational Hindi quotes for task completion messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that initializes and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDailyGoal.ts: Provides react-query hooks to get and set a user's daily goal and progress metrics using the actor and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useFocusMode.ts: Manages a focus mode toggle stored in localStorage with simple state and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider handling auth client creation, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useReminderNotificati: Watches tasks for due reminders, prevents duplicate firings, and triggers toast and browser notifications based on focus mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyZone.ts: Defines react-query hooks for managing study subjects and assignments including creation, retrieval, and completion with error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Offers react-query hooks for CRUD operations on tasks, reminders, and fetching the caller's user profile with toast feedback.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles plus custom theme variables, dark mode, and print-optimized styles.
frontend/src/lib/reminders.ts: Utility functions for converting dates to nanoseconds, formatting reminder times, and validating reminder input.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a Tailwind-aware class name merging helper using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AddTaskPage.tsx: Renders a protected page with a form to create a new task and triggers a profile-setup modal when needed.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user task statistics, daily goal management, and a task list, with optional daily report and profile-setup flow.
frontend/src/pages/FocusModePage.tsx: Provides toggles and UI for enabling focus mode, showing a timer, and checking browser notification status.
frontend/src/pages/StudySubjectDetailPag: Shows assignments for a specific subject with options to add, complete, and delete assignments linked to tasks.
frontend/src/pages/StudySubjectsPage.tsx: Lists study subjects and includes a form for creating new subjects with inline error handling and profile-setup support.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: Displays support contact information, email links, and FAQ content within a protected page.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Authenticated tasks view that loads user tasks, handles errors and loading states, and shows profile setup when needed.
frontend/src/pages/TaskZenLanding.tsx: Landing page with hero, features, navigation, and themed visuals guiding users into the app.
frontend/src/pages/WorkZonePage.tsx: Authenticated work zone UI with local project and item management, including creation, editing, and completion tracking.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router route structure for landing and all authenticated app pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout utilities for the app.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state, goals, architecture notes, and known issues for expanding TaskZen into a multi‑module productivity app. Includes visual style guidelines, feature requirements, constraints, and existing implemented features.
